recipe.title: Autumn Minestrone
ingredients: 2 tablespoons canola or other vegetable oil
2 1/2 cups peeled and cubed winter squash*
1 1/2 cups cooked or canned cannellini beans (15-ounce can, drained)
*We recommend a firm, rich winter squash, such as acorn, delicata, or buttercup.
instructions: Warm the oil in a large soup pot on medium heat. Add the onions and garlic, and sauté for 5 minutes. Add the squash, celery, carrots, potatoes, oregano, salt, pepper, and water and cook for 10 minutes or until the potatoes are almost done. Add the kale and beans and simmer for another 5 to 7 minutes, until the kale is tender and the beans are hot. Serve immediately.
